key.name: enable-auto-zoning
key.description: Automatically tile windows when moved into a defined zone.

key.name: zones
key.description: A JSON string representing an array of zone objects.

key.name: restore-original-size-on-untile
key.description: When a window leaves all zones, restore its previous size/position.

key.name: tile-new-windows
key.description: Automatically tile newly opened windows if they fall into a zone.

key.name: highlight-on-hover
key.description: Visually highlight a zone when dragging a window over it.

key.name: cycle-zone-windows-accelerator
key.description: Keyboard shortcut to loop focus forward through windows in the active zone.

key.name: cycle-zone-windows-backward-accelerator
key.description: Keyboard shortcut to loop focus backward through windows in the active zone.

key.name: tab-bar-height
key.description: Height in pixels of the tab bar.

key.name: tab-font-size
key.description: Font size in pixels for the tab labels.

key.name: zone-gap-size
key.description: Pixel size of the gap around and between window zones. Set to 0 to disable gaps. Changes may require a re-snap of windows.
